```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
UNESCO <- read_csv('../data/UNESCO-2011.csv')
```

```{r}
UN <- read_csv('../data/UN-data.csv')
```
```{r}
UNESCO <- UNESCO %>% 
    mutate(Country = strsplit(Country, ",")) %>% 
    unnest(Country)
```

```{r}
UN_UNESCO <- merge(UN, UNESCO, by = 'Country')
```

```{r}
n_distinct(UN_UNESCO$Country)
```
```{r}
UN_UNESCO %>% 
  filter(Country == 'Iran (Islamic Republic of)')
```
